content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
- Small electric poles at various positions including (-11.5, 26.5), (-8.5, 23.5), (-7.5, 22.5), and others

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position(5, 5) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position(y1) to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no obstructions in the path when attempting to connect pipes between entities. Check the area for any overlapping structures or entities that may block the connection.

### Errors when using electric entities
- Make sure that all electric entities are properly connected to the power network. Check the status of poles and ensure they are within range to provide power to connected entities.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.
